attributes.action: Make LPG gas open to fair competition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have just moved into a new property wherby my only gas supplier is LPG Flogas. We have no choice but to choose this supplier and have not had the opportunity to shop around. We are now faced with a huge bill and a company that controls the market and is not regulated. Please sign this petition to stop companies holding the open market to ransom and making customers pay over the odds while they receive a huge profit. My wife and my newborn baby deserve to be kept warm.
